ranked_diseases.explanation: The patient exhibits all the key phenotypic features characteristic of Microphthalmia/coloboma 11, which have been observed in multiple similar reference cases.
CHARGE Syndrome can present with features such as colobomas and microphthalmia, although it is less specific due to the absence of other defining features of CHARGE Syndrome.
While primarily a vascular disorder, COL4A1-related conditions can include ocular anomalies similar to those presented but correlate less directly without direct vascular malformations.
